There are so many doors on this corner building I must have looked like an idiot trying  to pull on one closed door after another.  This place is cash only.  Padron Peppers are good everywhere in Spain and if you haven't tried it yet, now would be a good time to try it.  The beef here is definitely special.  It has a very earthy taste to it as if the cow was happily grass feeding in the open and now it rests in my belly and I feel just as happy.  I think the foie gras can be skipped as it can be had everywhere in Spain.  The way they served it was a slab or two grilled and topped with grilled onions...overall, nothing special and it was on the pricier side.
